body.para: The spindle moves vertically on the column forming Z-axis. Built-in AC servomotor is used to drive the spindle. Oil-air lubrication is used for 10,000 and 14,000 rpm spindle bearing lubrication. The spindle housing and motor are cooled by jacket cooling.
Spindle with 14,000 rpm is standard specification and 10,000 rpm is optional. For both 10,000 and 14,000 rpm spindles, Through Spindle Coolant (TSC) function is optional.
